## R Markdown

This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see <http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com>.

When you click the **Knit** button a document will be generated that includes both content as well as the output of any embedded R code chunks within the document. You can embed an R code chunk like this:

```{r cars}
library(tidyverse)
library(here)

# For text mining:

library(pdftools)
library(tidytext)
library(textdata) 
library(ggwordcloud)                   
```
```{r}

GOT_PDF <- pdf_text("data/got.pdf")

```

## Including Plots

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
GOT_df <- data.frame(GOT_PDF) %>% 
  mutate(text_full = str_split(GOT_PDF, pattern = '\n')) %>% 
  unnest(text_full) %>% 
  mutate(text_full = str_trim(text_full)) 
GOT_df
```
```{r}
GOT_tokens <- GOT_df %>% 
  unnest_tokens(word, text_full)
GOT_tokens
```
```{r}
GOT_wc <- GOT_tokens %>% 
  count(word) %>% 
  arrange(-n)
GOT_wc
```
```{r}
view(stop_words)
GOT_stop <- GOT_tokens %>% 
  anti_join(stop_words) %>% 
  select(-GOT_PDF)
```
```{r}
GOT_swc <- GOT_stop %>% 
  count(word) %>% 
  arrange(-n)
GOT_swc
```
```{r}
GOT_no_numeric <- GOT_stop %>% 
  filter(is.na(as.numeric(word)))
GOT_no_numeric
```
```{r}
length(unique(GOT_no_numeric$word))

GOT_top100 <- GOT_no_numeric %>% 
  count(word) %>% 
  arrange(-n) %>% 
  head(100)
GOT_top100
```
```{r}
ggplot(data = GOT_top100, aes(label = word, size = n)) +
  geom_text_wordcloud_area(aes(color = n), shape = "star") +
  scale_size_area(max_size = 12) +
  scale_color_gradientn(colors = c("darkgreen","blue","red")) +
  theme_minimal()
```
```{r}
get_sentiments(lexicon = "afinn")
afinn_pos <- get_sentiments("afinn") %>% 
  filter(value %in% c(3,4,5))
afinn_pos
```
```{r}
get_sentiments(lexicon = "bing")
```
```{r}
get_sentiments(lexicon = "nrc")
```
```{r}
GOT_afinn <- GOT_stop %>% 
  inner_join(get_sentiments("afinn"))
GOT_afinn
```
```{r}
GOT_afinn_hist <- GOT_afinn %>% 
  count(value)

ggplot(data = GOT_afinn_hist, aes(x = value, y = n)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = value)) +
  theme_bw()
```
```{r}
GOT_summary <- GOT_afinn %>% 
  summarize(
    mean_score = mean(value),
    median_score = median(value)
  )
GOT_summary
```
```{r}
GOT_nrc <- GOT_stop %>% 
  inner_join(get_sentiments("nrc"))
GOT_nrc
```

```{r}
GOT_exclude <- GOT_stop %>% 
  anti_join(get_sentiments("nrc"))

GOT_exclude_n <- GOT_exclude %>% 
  count(word, sort = TRUE)

head(GOT_exclude_n)
```
```{r}
GOT_nrc_n <- GOT_nrc %>% 
  count(sentiment, sort = TRUE)


ggplot(data = GOT_nrc_n, aes(x = sentiment, y = n)) +
  geom_col(aes(fill = sentiment))+
  theme_bw()
```
```{r}
GOT_nrc_n5 <- GOT_nrc %>% 
  count(word,sentiment, sort = TRUE) %>% 
  group_by(sentiment) %>% 
  top_n(5) %>% 
  ungroup()

GOT_nrc_gg <- ggplot(data = GOT_nrc_n5, aes(x = reorder(word,n), y = n, fill = sentiment)) +
  geom_col(show.legend = FALSE) +
  facet_wrap(~sentiment, ncol = 2, scales = "free") +
  coord_flip() +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(x = "Word", y = "count")

GOT_nrc_gg
```

lord <- get_sentiments(lexicon = "nrc") %>%

lord
